data.text: @CBCOttawa Finally!!! I get to go have a great steak tonight with my wife. I will be calling around to make sure no vaccine passports are required prior to going.

@StealthyScholar @CBCOttawa Actually it does increase safety Even if it means a small %, still deadly to seniors & I care for 4 of them.
their lives mean more to me that you having to wear a mask or produce a simple screen shot for 5 minutes of your day.
@Bryan_C_Murray @sens_sports85 @CBCOttawa Thank god the passport is illegal in most of the US.

@sens_sports85 @CBCOttawa Its all personal choice at this point. Im fine with a vax pass being asked for for restaurants and such if they choose to and others that dont.

If ppl don't feel safe yet they can go to those restaurants that do can choose to not go there if they want.
@CBCOttawa I am vaccinated plus a booster. If you ask for my pass after March 1st I will leave your establishment. We need to bring people together. Stop with this devisive bullshit.
@j_anderson19 @CBCOttawa So it is the business owners right to choose which policies to enforce to keep their staff and clientele safe. Glad you understood.

@BarrhavenGuy @CBCOttawa Glad to hear you are open to choice, but the infection/spread between vaxxed and non-vaxxed are negligible with omicron, so banning the unvaxxed wouldn't really increase safety. (Ontario data since that is where I live) https://t.co/HG3nehdGHy
